casebody.data:
FENTON C. MACLAY v. ROBERT MUIR MACLAY 12 So. (2nd) 451

January Term, 1943

March 19, 1943 Division B Loftin, Calkins, Anderson, Scott & Preston and N. J. Durant, for appellant. Middleton McDonald, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.

Costs of this appeal, including fifty dollars to defray the expenses of counsel for the appellant in presenting the matter to this Court, are assessed against appellee.

It is so ordered.

BUFORD, C. J., BROWN, THOMAS and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
